title: Remove landing page hero image

requirements.text: Remove the hero image block from the landing page AuthGate component so the page no longer renders any hero image or hero-image fallback placeholder above the main headline.
acceptanceCriteria: On the AuthGate (landing) page, no image is displayed above the main headline.
The previous fallback 'Hero image' placeholder UI is not rendered anywhere on the landing page.
The page layout remains visually balanced (no large empty container where the image used to be).

requirements.text: Clean up AuthGate component code after removing the hero image by deleting unused state and imports related to hero-image error handling.
acceptanceCriteria: `useState` and the `imageError/setImageError` logic are removed from `frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx` if no longer needed.
The landing page builds without TypeScript/ESLint unused import warnings caused by the removal.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not remove hero images used on other pages (e.g., evangelism pages) unless they are part of AuthGate.
Do not change landing page headline, subheadline, CTA button copy, or navigation behavior beyond what is necessary to remove the hero image.
